snippet: Cast in papier-mâché and mounted on black or chromed steel, Harry Allen’s collection includes a table lamp, floor lamp and chandelier.
abstract: Designer Harry Allen has transformed an old barn lantern into a ghostly lighting fixture by casting it in paper mache; table lamp, floor lamp and chandelier versions of the piece are being sold by Hive.
lead_paragraph: Cast in papier-mâché and mounted on black or chromed steel, Harry Allen’s collection includes a table lamp, floor lamp and chandelier.
